items: Start by sitting on the floor with your legs extended in front of you.
Bend your right knee and bring your foot towards your left hip, placing it on the floor.
Place your right hand on the floor behind you for support.
Reach your left arm up and over your head, bending your torso towards your right side.
Place your left hand on your right knee and gently press it towards the floor.
Hold the stretch for 10-15 seconds, then release and repeat on the other side.
Improves flexibility and range of motion in the calves
Reduces the risk of injury in the lower legs and feet
Relieves tension and tightness in the calves
Can help alleviate plantar fasciitis and other foot conditions
Can be done anywhere, without any equipment
